about_the_game:
Terminate: Project X is a horror first-person shooter inspired by dystopian, violent and
grimdark themes.

FEATURES
  • Two difficulties, Hard and Nightmare
  • 6 Unique maps
  • Several types of special infected
  • Objectives

    In the game the player is sent as an artificial intelligence robot to the recently
    closed genetic engineering facility known as New Sapiens. After the COO of the
    facility, Dr. Feller, announced that a new disease took over their genetically
    enhanced human specimens, nasty rumors spread in the media. Majority of the
    population were against experiments with humans to begin with. New Sapiens
    took it a step further by carrying out research with newborn babies, which granted
    the homo sapiens species the best properties of all animals combined: high IQ of
    human, speed of cheetah, strength of gorilla, jump of spider… the hijacked list
    continued.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore

name: Terminate: Study X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700k equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980/ AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 MB available space

short_description: Become the machine, find out what happened in New Sapiens and eradicate the infected in a single player first-person shooter campaign of horror and gore.
